mapper.select: SELECT DISTINCT td.device_id AS point_id, ta.area_id AS area_id, ta.area_name AS area_name, td.device_code AS point_code, td.device_name AS point_name, td.device_x AS point_lng, td.device_y AS point_lat, ts.status_code AS point_status, ts.status_name AS point_status_name, tm.thing_id AS thing_id, tm.thing_code AS thing_code, tm.thing_name AS thing_name, tm.thing_unit AS thing_unit, tdd.recent_data AS thing_value, tm.thing_order AS thing_order, bml.level_name AS thing_level_name, bml.level_no AS thing_level_no, bml.level_color AS thing_level_color FROM tbl_device td INNER JOIN tbl_area ta ON td.area_id = ta.area_id LEFT JOIN tbl_status ts ON td.status_code = ts.status_code LEFT JOIN tbl_device_data tdd ON td.device_code = tdd.device_code LEFT JOIN tbl_monitor tm ON tdd.thing_code = tm.thing_code LEFT JOIN tbl_monitor_level bml ON tdd.thing_code = bml.thing_code AND tdd.recent_data >= bml.level_min AND tdd.recent_data < bml.level_max WHERE td.device_type = '1' AND td.device_code = #{deviceCode} AND tdd.data_type = #{dataType} AND tm.thing_order IS NOT NULL ORDER BY tm.thing_order

SELECT DISTINCT TEMP.thing_id, TEMP.thing_code, TEMP.thing_name, TEMP.thing_unit, TEMP.thing_value, TEMP.thing_order, bml.level_name AS thing_level_name, bml.level_no AS thing_level_no, bml.level_color AS thing_level_color FROM ( SELECT DISTINCT tm.thing_id AS thing_id, tm.thing_code AS thing_code, tm.thing_name AS thing_name, tm.thing_unit AS thing_unit, ROUND(AVG(tdd.recent_data),3) AS thing_value, tm.thing_order AS thing_order FROM tbl_device td LEFT JOIN tbl_status ts ON td.status_code = ts.status_code LEFT JOIN tbl_device_data tdd ON td.device_code = tdd.device_code
AND tdd.thing_code IN
#{item}
AND tdd.thing_code IS NULL
LEFT JOIN tbl_monitor tm ON tdd.thing_code = tm.thing_code WHERE td.device_type = '1'
AND td.device_code IN
#{item}
AND td.device_code IS NULL
AND tdd.data_type = #{dataType} AND tm.thing_order IS NOT NULL GROUP BY tm.thing_id,tm.thing_code,tm.thing_name,tm.thing_unit,tm.thing_order ) TEMP LEFT JOIN tbl_monitor_level bml ON TEMP.thing_code = bml.thing_code AND TEMP.thing_value >= bml.level_min AND TEMP.thing_value < bml.level_max ORDER BY TEMP.thing_order

SELECT DISTINCT tm.thing_id AS thing_id, tm.thing_code AS thing_code, tm.thing_name AS thing_name, tm.thing_unit AS thing_unit, #{mobileMonitorModel.thingValue} AS thing_value, tm.thing_order AS thing_order, bml.level_name AS thing_level_name, bml.level_no AS thing_level_no, bml.level_color AS thing_level_color FROM tbl_monitor tm LEFT JOIN tbl_monitor_level bml ON tm.thing_code = bml.thing_code AND #{mobileMonitorModel.thingValue} >= bml.level_min AND #{mobileMonitorModel.thingValue} < bml.level_max WHERE tm.thing_code = #{mobileMonitorModel.thingCode}
